Get Involved

Become a Volunteer

Why join DUCA?

DUCA is a student-run cybersecurity club where members learn by doing. Whether you want to build skills for competitions, get hands-on development experience, help with outreach, or practice ethical hacking, DUCA provides mentorship, a supportive community, and real-world projects to grow your portfolio.

  • Practical, hands-on learning through projects and events
  • Opportunities to compete in CTF events and conferences
  • Mentorship from experienced students and alumni
  • Collaboration on dev and security projects for real impact
  • Networking and resume-building experiences
  • Flexible roles across technical and non-technical disciplines

Find a Division You Belong!

Capture the Flag

Love puzzles? We do too! Join us to solve fun cybersecurity challenges together, learn new tricks, and compete as a team in a relaxed, friendly way.

Learn more

Development

We build cool tools and projects for the club! Whether you’re new to coding or experienced, we’ll learn together and create awesome things as a team.

Learn more

Advertising

We make the club look amazing! From posters to social media, we share good vibes and help everyone feel welcome. Creativity is always encouraged here!

Learn more

Pentesting

Curious about ethical hacking? We explore it safely and step by step! Learn how attackers think and how to defend systems—all in a fun, friendly space.

Learn more

Cyber Essentials

Start with the basics in a friendly, hands‑on way! We cover safe browsing, strong passwords, common threats, and simple defensive skills to build confidence.

Learn more

Networking

Explore how the internet really works—packets, protocols, Wi‑Fi, and security. We learn by doing with approachable labs and lots of curious questions!

Learn more

Pentesting

Discover ethical hacking in safe, guided labs! We practice recon, testing vulnerabilities, and defense techniques—welcoming for beginners and fun for everyone.

Learn more

Ready to join DUCA?

Join now

Footer

The Deakin University Cybersecurity Association (DUCA) is a student-led community driven by the ambition and dedication of its members. DUCA is a launchpad for the next generation of cybersecurity professionals.
